effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Treads of Sordid Screams

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,169 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 372,319 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 103,422 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.

name: Crusher of the Unsettled
description: The best tool for collecting delinquent bar tabs.

name: Alliance Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Alliance.
